params.currPrice: - the current price of the underlying with decimals
params.impliedVolatility: - the implied volatility for x days in promille => 30% = 3000
params.impliedVolatilityTime: - the time of the volatility in seconds
params.lowerPrice: - lower price of the price range with decimals
params.timeUntilEpxiry: - the remaining time until expiration in seconds
params.upperPrice: - upper price of the price range with decimals
